Detailed Description

Square coordinates on chess board.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

ChSquare::ChSquare ( int  row,
int  column 
)

Constructs square.

Parameters:
row - row of square on board (from 0 to CH_BOARD_SIZE - 1)
column - column of square on board (from 0 to CH_BOARD_SIZE - 1)
Exceptions:
ChLogicException in case if square is out of board.

ChSquare::ChSquare ( int  index  )  [explicit]

Constructs square.

Parameters:
index - index on board. Squares on board are numbered from 0 till (CH_BOARD_SIZE * CH_BOARD_SIZE - 1) from left to right from bottom to top.
Exceptions:
ChLogicException in case if square is out of board.
